thread.title: Ricardo

author: Ricardo
title: Ricardo
text:
On my arrival in Marseille (France), the Goldcar agent tried to sell me its own insurance. I said that I was already insured, but he forced me to pay extra insurance at the desk. After several unsuccessfull e-mails with Goldcar, I decided to start a claim on website of Weclaim :
â€¦ And I won !
Take a look at this article published in Le Monde,
They talk about Weclaim and its big victories in Court against Goldcar !
